Inside Macintosh: Apple Game Sprockets Guide /
Chapter 4 - NetSprocket / NetSprocket Reference
Data Structures

Game Reference

You use the game reference to identify your game to the NetSprocket library.

typedef     struct      NSpGamePrivate    
*NSpGameReference;
Field descriptions

NSpGameReference
An opaque reference returned to you via a successful call to NSpGame_Host or NSpGame_Join. This reference is passed to most NetSprocket functions as the first parameter.
